remarks: If ` B ` is a shift of ` A ` by ` C ` , then ` A ` is a shift of ` B ` by ` -u C ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Apr-2015.)
statement:
ovolshft.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) $.
ovolshft.2 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
ovolshft.3 $e |- ( ph -> B = { x e. RR | ( x - C ) e. A } ) $.
shft2rab $p |- ( ph -> A = { y e. RR | ( y - -u C ) e. B } ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d C x y $.
$d ph y $.
